level.text: "Child development center" means "child development center" as defined in § 4-401(2).
"Child development home" means "child development home" as defined in § 4-401(3).
"Fund" means the Child Care Services Assistance Fund established by § 7-2002.
"Person" means an individual, partnership, association, or corporation.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-220
level.text: Law 7-220, the "Child Care Services Assistance Fund Act of 1988," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-405, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 29, 1988 and December 13, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 6, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 7-295 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
